system.description:
At 1st level you know 3 cantrips of your choice from the Sorcerer spell list.

Your spellcasting ability modifier for these cantrips and all Spellslinger spells is Charisma.

The saving throw DC of your spells is 10 +[Proficiency Bonus] +[Charisma modifier]. However when used as a ranged weapon attack, or as part of a combat maneuver, you may use strength or dexterity as normal.
